title: The Secret to Viral Videos
content:
Retention. That's it. If your video can retain 25% percent of viewers by the end of the video; It'll do well. Over 50%? That's a viral video. This sounds simple but its a very hard thing to figure out. 

First step is to have a really engaging hook. Something compelling enough for a viewer to give your content a chance. This could be a compelling question or radical statement. It could even be something visually interesting that sparks a viewers curiosity. Without a good hook, it doesn't matter how good your content is. Here are some examples of hooks: 

* You cannot trust Canadians but not for the reason you think.
